title: Furnished Luxurious 4BR/4BA house for rent
posting_body: Built in 2011, this 4 bed / 3.5 bath house is a wonderful opportunity to live in Millbrae's most luxurious community.

The furnished house has 2 master suites, high ceilings, plantation shutters, hardwood flooring throughout, tall arched doorways, recessed lighting, 2 car garage, and too many other amenities to mention.
The kitchen and living room is an open floor plan with large windows allowing in plenty of light.
A backyard patio offers one to enjoy the spectacular views of the bay and airport.
Small dogs under 25 lbs are okay.
Please contact me to schedule a viewing.
